caption: A group of people stood in line at an amusement park, and two boys boarded a roller coaster. A massive mechanical arm swung them outward. After their roller coaster ride, they continued exploring the amusement park. In the evening, they returned home, lay on their beds. One boy went from upstairs to the first floor. A man was working on the computer. The boy used the computer to send an email while the man was away. The police rushed over and quickly apprehended a man. Another man, a dog, and a boy sat in a car. They arrived at a house. The boy began calling another boy but went to the pool and found his friend.
